div.div: (a) Select variable temperature saturation recovery curves for 3′. The data were collected via application of the pulse sequence depicted above the plot, in the temperature range of 5 to 280 K. (b) Summary of temperature dependent T 1 data determined for 1′–4′. Inset: Fit to the temperature dependence of T 1 for 2′, highlighting the relaxation mechanisms discussed in the text.
